news.title: Justia’s 2022 Year in Review
news.description: Take a peek behind the doors at Justia to see some of our highlights over the past year, including accomplishments, changes, and time spent with our team!

news.title: The State of Legal Marketing 2022
news.description: Join us for an end-of-year survey looking at some of the trends that shaped digital and legal marketing in 2022. Plus, check out our predictions for what is on the horizon in 2023.

news.title: Justia Free Resources: Aviation Law Center
news.description: You probably don’t think twice before hopping on a plane for a vacation or a work event. But not every flight is smooth. The Aviation Law Center at Justia discusses many of the rules that may apply when something goes wrong.

news.title: Justia Free Resources: Foreclosure Center
news.description: When the economy goes downhill, the risk of foreclosure looms large. The prospect of losing a home is daunting, but homeowners may have more options than they realize. The Foreclosure Center at Justia is designed to empower them.

news.title: Justia Ask A Lawyer by the Numbers: Third Quarter 2022
news.description: We’re back with another edition of Justia Ask A Lawyer by the Numbers, a series where we’re offering you a glimpse at the usage statistics for consumers and lawyers on our free question-and-answer forum!
